issue.title: [CI][C++] MinGW builds failing when trying to build Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12780](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12780). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
clang is failing to run because of a missing DLL. The trick is to use strace which will tell you the exact missing package, in this case it happens to be libxml2.

<https://github.com/msys2/MINGW-packages/issues/544#issuecomment-802725054>
